product_name: adidas AX 1 Mid Leather Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The comfortable women's adidas AX 1 Mid Leather Hiking Boots are built to be fast, agile and grippy when you're day hiking through the mountains on rugged trails. Durable and rich nubuck leather uppers break in for a soft and comfortable fit. Molded EVA sock liners provide all-day comfort. Toe and heel caps protect the leather from abrasion. Speed grip outsoles offer excellent traction on a variety of surfaces, from slick rocks to dusty trails. Closeout.
short_description: The comfortable women's adidas AX 1 Mid Leather Hiking Boots are built to be fast, agile and grippy when you're day hiking through the mountains on rugged trails.
